short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert any web page into a HD image screenshot. Do you want that a HD full length screenshot? No problem.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take a HD screenshot of any web page, with multiple options such as a full length screenshots, or hiding cookie notification boxes. Because its HD the image will be larger than your screen.

Once you have installed your extension just follow the instructions in the extension popup to sign up and get converting!
